question: In which nation "Inter-American Court of Human Rights" is located?
explanation: Inter-American Court of Human Rights is an independent judicial institution to enforce and interpret the provisions of the American Convention on Human rights. It was established in 1979 and is headquartered in San Jose, Costa Rica. Inter-American Court of HumanRights and Inter-American Commission on HumanRights together make up the human rights protection system of the Organisation of American States.
